verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: I am resolved no longer to linger,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Things that are higher,
Things that are nobler,

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: I am resolved to go to the Saviour,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He is the true one,
He is the just one
He hath the words of life.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: I am resolved to follow the Saviour,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Heed what He sayeth,
Do what He willeth,

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines: I am resolved to enter the kingdom,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Friends may oppose me,
Foes may beset me,

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines: I am resolved, and who will go with me?

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Taught by the Bible,
led by the Spirit,
